information.name: registration
information.description: A simple UCRM Plugin to provide self-service Client registration.
information.author: Ryan Spaeth <rspaeth@mvqn.net>

configuration.label: Language
configuration.description: The language to use on the Registration form.  Defaults to the UCRM language.

configuration.label: Organization ID
configuration.description: The Organization ID for which to assign all new Client Leads. If blank, the default Organization is used.

configuration.label: Default Latitude
configuration.description: The default latitude position on the map.  Defaults to 37.09024 (United States).

configuration.label: Default Longitude
configuration.description: The default longitude position on the map.  Defaults to -95.712891 (United States).

configuration.label: Default Zoom Level
configuration.description: The default zoom level on the map.  Defaults to 3.

configuration.label: Map Layer (Optional)
configuration.description: A link to either a KMZ/KML file or a GeoRSS feed to use as an overlay on the map.
